snippet.title: Far Cry 3 Four Player Co-op Demo - Sony E3 2012 Press Conference
snippet.description:
Ubisoft shows how you can run and gun with 3 friends in this live demo of Far Cry 3's co-operative multiplayer during Sony's E3 2012 press conference. What do you guys think? Are you interested in playing four player co-op in Far Cry 3?

The latest news, trailers and more live from E3 2012:
http://www.ign.com/events/e3

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
